page.title: 12NEW HALL BOREHAM 2 SCHOOL
page.content: In 1798 New Hall was purchased for the English nuns of the Holy Sepulchre, who re-opened a school they had founded in Liege in 1642. Today New Hall is an Independent school for 370 boarders and 140 day pupils, between the ages of 11 and 18.The school is a charitable trust with a board of governers.
